plot: Creepy things are afoot when the gang meets a mysterious old innkeeper with a secret.

Katara and her friends meet Hama, a water bender from the Southern Water Tribe and an old friend of Kanna. Team Avatar begins to realize that Hama has harbored a very dark secret, it is soon discovered that Hama has been capturing innocent Fire Nation villagers and she has learned a very dangerous form of bending when she was imprisoned by the Fire Nation, which is blood bending. Katara and her friends try to stop Hama from harming any more people. Katara reluctantly uses blood bending against Hama to stop her from hurting Aang and Sokka. Hama is soon arrested for kidnapping and false imprisonment, she praises Katara for being a blood bender. Aang and Sokka comfort a distraught Katara over her predicament.—dawsonpersi
